mapper.select: select page.page_name from user, role, page, page_role where user.role_id = role.role_id and role.role_id = page_role.role_id and page_role.page_id = page.page_id and user.confirmed = 1 and user.username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into user (username, password, gender, age, prc_id, department, license_id, phone_no, picture_path, confirmed, team_id, hospital_id, role_id) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{prcId}, #{department}, #{licenseId}, #{phoneNo}, #{picturePath}, #{confirmed}, #{teamId}, #{hospitalId}, #{roleId})
